overview: What is it about a weekend away and a glass of fine wine that gets most men in the mood to fuck? When Connor Maguire goes on a guys-only retreat with his old college roomies, Drake Tyler and Josh Villa, they begin to reminisce about the good ol’ days, until Connor lets it slip that the best blowjob he’s ever had was from his best bud Drake. It isn’t long before the three of them find themselves reliving their glory days of college exploration and hormone-fueled sex all over again. If anybody ever finds out, they can always blame it on the booze! So get ready to pop your cork along with Markie More, Brenner Bolton, Jordan Evans, Colt Rivers, and irresistible newcomer Arad, as they let the drinks flow and the cum fly in five gay getaway stories you’ll be happy you stayed home to see. A Next Door Buddies anthology.
title: Alumni Weekend
